channel.title: Bev Shipley
channel.description: Recent news about Bev Shipley, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Hope u can make it out 2 the Western Fair-open today. Don't forget your local fairs, too. Lots of them in the coming weeks around #LKM!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great news! The World Economic Forum has rated Canada's financial system the safest and soundest in the world for the 6th year in a row.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Nice to meet w parent reps from Wallaceburg and Chatham Christian Schools. Tour of Truly Green Tomato Greenhouses-leading edge technology.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Good luck to all the students across Lambton-Kent-Middlesex who've returned to school today. Work hard and have fun! Drivers, be aware. #LKM

item.title: Mentioned by Chatham Daily News
item.description:
Chatham-Kent trailer maker recognized
Lambton-Kent-Middlesex MP Bev Shipley, left, presents a certificate to Amelia and Denis Marcus of Comptank Corp. in Bothwell, a sister company of Harold Marcus Ltd., on the completion of the 700th tank trailer used to haul corrosive material on the highway.

item.title: Mentioned by Strathroy Age Dispatch
item.description:
Summer job funding announced
Local MP Bev Shipley announced last week that nearly $250,000 in funding is being provided to create 104 summer student jobs in Lambton-Kent-Middlesex. Jobs range from working with chamber of commerce, to promoting history at area museums to ...
